amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 115-830 to reduce Interior operations funds and increase BIA construction funds by 10 million dollars.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.
